name: The reason why she doesn't cast a recovery spell

description:
[Story]
A boy and girl attending an adventuring school are torn apart by the
arrival of a new transfer student just as final exams are approaching.

What fate awaits this couple?
There is no escaping the cuckoldry...

Enjoy this NTR story told from two perspectives!

[H Scenes]

23 base event CG + pose art + variations
20 H scenes ( 6 in Boyfriend + 14 in Girlfriend)
Some animations included

[RPG Elements]

  • Enjoy fast-paced dungeon delving with random elements, and easy auto-battle functions!
  • In "Boyfriend", you play a swordsman, and you can cut down your enemies.
  • In "Girlfriend", you play as a support healer, who can also use enemy manipulation powers.
  • Lots of bonuses, such as mini-game, extra dungeon, etc. included as well!
